summary: Provides in‑memory data models and a mock backend that emulate AWS Cloud Map (Service Discovery). It defines entities such as namespaces, services, instances and operations, supports their creation, update, deletion, health‑check handling, discovery queries and resource tagging, and serialises them to JSON for API responses.
business_intent: Enable developers to test and develop applications that interact with AWS Service Discovery without contacting the real AWS endpoints, by offering a fully functional local simulation of the Cloud Map API.
